Articles.Content:
is there anyway to make more scales for TweakScale in config or a mod ?

i really need it.

Look under Example Configurations, does that help? Simply edit the .cfg containing your part in a text editor.

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/80234-0-25-TweakScale-Rescale-Everything!-%28v1-44-2014-10-10-19-20-UTC%29
